data.text: @Petchary thanks for reaching out to us. We understand your concern. Currently, Caribbean Airlines Boeing 737-800 is used on all our routes, not the Boeing 737 MAX-8. The Boeing 737 MAX-8 is the one involved in the crash and under investigation.
@riche90210 Hi Roger, we appreciate your feedback. We'll pass it on to our team for consideration.
@ruthbagan_ Hi Ruth, we're very concerned to hear this and we'd like to assist. Could you please send us a private message with your booking details as well as your name, email and contact number?
@D_ncredible See you there! 🙂

data.text: Ted Eustace, congratulations on placing 1st in the Prelims! Wishing you the best of luck with your portrayal of the costume "What Lurks In The Night" in the NCC Kings & Queens of Carnival Finals tonight! Represent your Caribbean Identity! #thecaribbeanidentity #iflycaribbean https://t.co/uIGCtAwmMZ

@Lafoncette We're sorry to hear you had this experience. We're really glad that you've reached out to us as our Customer Relations team is always ready and willing to help you. Please get in touch with them here: https://t.co/65HzFGlbIN. Let's work towards a resolution together.
@Monkish22 we assure you that we haven't deleted your comment or the post.

@Monkish22  Hi! We respond in a timely manner to customer complaints.  We will acknowledge written complaints within 30 days of receipt and will send a substantive written response within 60 days. Hope this helps!
@IvanSaroop  thank you for bringing this to our attention. Please feel free to share any information that will help us investigate this.
@Monkish22 We’re sorry to hear this! Please complete and submit our baggage claim form online within seven days here: https://t.co/kRIJ252pYu.

It has been 49 years of continued growth and development. It is then with great pleasure that we wish our friends and family in Guyana a very Happy Republic Day! #thecaribbeanidentity https://t.co/vFKQX2OXg9
